netherportals: CREATE TABLE netherportals ( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE, xcord_overworld INTEGER, ycord_overworld INTEGER, zcord_overworld INTEGER, xcord_nether INTEGER, ycord_nether INTEGER, zcord_nether INTEGER, local_overworld TEXT, owner_overworld TEXT, notes_overworld TEXT, overworld_true_name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, local_nether TEXT, owner_nether TEXT, notes_nether TEXT, nether_true_name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, username TEXT NOT NULL references userprofile(username));
userprofile: CREATE TABLE userprofile ( id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, password TEXT NOT NULL, firstname TEXT NOT NULL, lastname TEXT NOT NULL, role TEXT NOT NULL );
native_user_keys: CREATE TABLE native_user_keys ( id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, sessionid TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, lastactive TEXT NOT NULL, expiration TEXT NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE );
kingtest: CREATE TABLE kingtest ( id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, somdata TEXT );
netherportal_images: CREATE TABLE netherportal_images (id INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, true_name TEXT NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL references userprofile(username));
netherportal_access_rights: CREATE TABLE netherportal_access_rights (id INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, netherportals TEXT [], username TEXT NOT NULL references userprofile(username));
